body_html: While we're at it, there are also tests in ATen and adding it as a submodule in torch/lib wouldn't let us use it. It would be good to figure out a strategy to have Catch work both for ATen (including the standalone repo) and for PyTorch.
body_text: While we're at it, there are also tests in ATen and adding it as a submodule in torch/lib wouldn't let us use it. It would be good to figure out a strategy to have Catch work both for ATen (including the standalone repo) and for PyTorch.
body: While we're at it, there are also tests in ATen and adding it as a submodule in `torch/lib` wouldn't let us use it. It would be good to figure out a strategy to have Catch work both for ATen (including the standalone repo) and for PyTorch.
